description.english: Completely clean the Van using only the red nozzle

description.spanish: Limpia la furgoneta usando únicamente la boquilla roja.
description.schinese: 仅使用红色喷嘴彻底清洗面包车
description.tchinese: 僅使用紅色噴嘴徹底清潔廂型車
description.russian: Полностью отмойте фургон, используя только красное сопло

description.turkish: Minibüsü yalnızca kırmızı başlığı kullanarak tamamen temizle
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente a Van usando apenas o bocal vermelho.

description.english: In the Backyard, complete all 12 stepping stones first
description.german: Schließe im Hinterhof zuerst alle 12 Trittsteine ab

description.spanish: En el jardín, limpia primero las 12 piedras del camino.
description.schinese: 在后院，首先清洗完全部12块踏脚石
description.tchinese: 在後院先完成所有 12 個墊腳石
description.russian: Отмойте дорожку из 12 камешков на заднем дворе в первую очередь
description.japanese: 裏庭で、最初に12個の飛び石を完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: Arka bahçede ilk olarak 12 basamak taşının temizliğini tamamla
description.brazilian: No Quintal, limpe os 12 degraus primeiro.

description.english: In the Playground, roll the football up the stegoslide
description.german: Rolle auf dem Spielplatz den Ball die Stego-Rutsche hinauf
description.french: Sur le terrain de jeu, faites rouler le ballon de football jusqu'en haut du stégoboggan
description.italian: Nel parco giochi, fai rotolare il pallone verso l'alto sullo stegoscivolo
description.koreana: 놀이터에서 공룡 미끄럼틀 위로 축구공 굴려 올리기
description.spanish: En el parque infantil, haz rodar el balón por el tobogán de estegosaurio.

description.tchinese: 在操場將足球滾上劍龍溜滑梯
description.russian: Закатите мяч на горку-динозавра на детской площадке
description.japanese: 公園で、サッカーボールを転がしてステゴサウルスの滑り台の上に載せる
description.turkish: Oyun parkında futbol topunu dino kaydıraktan yukarı yuvarla
description.brazilian: No Parquinho, role a bola de futebol no estegoscorregador.

description.english: Complete the Bungalow gutters last
description.german: Schließe die Dachrinnen des Bungalows zuletzt ab
description.french: Terminez les gouttières du bungalow en dernier
description.italian: Nel bungalow, completa le grondaie per ultime
description.koreana: 펜션 홈통을 맨 마지막으로 세척
description.spanish: Limpia los canalones del bungaló en último lugar.
description.schinese: 最后清洗完平房的檐沟
description.tchinese: 最後完成平房排水溝
description.russian: Отмойте стоки бунгало в последнюю очередь
description.japanese: バンガローの雨どいを、最後に洗浄する
description.turkish: Bungalovdaki olukları en son tamamla
description.brazilian: No Bangalô, limpe as calhas por último.

description.english: In the Detached House, complete the Pathway, Driveway and Driveway Edges first
description.german: Schließe beim alleinliegenden Haus den Weg, die Auffahrt und die Auffahrt-Ränder zuerst ab
description.french: Dans la maison individuelle, terminez d'abord le chemin d'accès, l'allée et les bords de l'allée

description.schinese: 在独栋别墅，首先清洗完通路、车道和车道边缘
description.tchinese: 首先完成獨立洋房的小徑、車道和車道邊緣
description.russian: У отдаленного дома отмойте дорожку, подъездную дорожку, а также ее края в первую очередь
description.japanese: 一軒家で、最初に玄関アプローチ、通路、通路の縁石を完全に洗浄する

description.english: Complete the sole of the Shoe House last

description.french: Terminez la semelle de la cabane en forme de chaussure en dernier
description.italian: Nella casa-scarpa, completa la suola per ultima
description.koreana: 신발 모양 집의 밑창을 맨 마지막으로 청소
description.spanish: Limpia la suela de la casa en forma de zapato en último lugar.
description.schinese: 最后清洗完鞋屋的鞋底
description.tchinese: 最後完成鞋屋的鞋底
description.russian: Отмойте подошву домика-ботинка в последнюю очередь

description.turkish: Ayakkabı Evin tabanını en son tamamla
description.brazilian: Limpe a sola da Casa-Sapato por último.

description.english: Completely clean the Fire Station job without standing on the scaffolding
description.german: Schließe den Job „Feuerwache reinigen“ ab, ohne dich auf das Gerüst zu stellen
description.french: Nettoyez intégralement la caserne des pompiers sans mettre le pied sur l'échafaudage

description.brazilian: Limpe completamente o Quartel de Bombeiros sem ficar no andaime.

description.schinese: 在滑板公园，将球推到碗外

description.russian: Вытолкните мяч из ямы скейт-парка

displayName.italian: Ora sì che ci vedo bene
displayName.spanish: Por fin veo tres en un burro

description.english: Complete the Fire Truck windows, windscreen and wing mirrors first

description.english: Complete the Fire Helicopter blades first
description.german: Schließe beim Feuerwehrhubschrauber die Rotorblätter zuerst ab

description.schinese: 首先清洗完消防直升机叶片
description.tchinese: 先完成消防直升機葉片
description.russian: Отмойте лопасти пожарного вертолета в первую очередь

description.brazilian: Limpe primeiro todas as hélices do Helicóptero de Combate a Incêndios.

displayName.french: Trois petits tours, et puis s'en vont
displayName.spanish: La de vueltas que da la vida

description.english: Completely clean the Carousel without turning it off
description.german: Reinige das Karussell vollständig, ohne es auszuschalten
description.french: Nettoyez intégralement le carrousel sans l'arrêter
description.italian: Pulisci completamente la giostra senza spegnerla
description.koreana: 회전목마를 켜 놓은 상태로 완전히 청소
description.spanish: Limpia el carrusel mientras está en marcha.
description.schinese: 彻底清洗旋转木马且不关闭它
description.tchinese: 在不關閉旋轉木馬的情況下將其徹底清潔
description.russian: Полностью отмойте карусель, не останавливая ее
description.japanese: メリーゴーランドを止めることなく、完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: Atlıkarıncayı çalışmaya devam ederken tamamen temizle
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente o Carrossel sem desligá-lo.

displayName.japanese: ノーム・スイート・ホーム

description.english: In the Temple, ensure the gnome is on the tower roof once the job is complete
description.german: Stelle im Tempel sicher, dass der Zwerg auf dem Turmdach steht, sobald der Job abgeschlossen ist
description.french: Dans le temple, assurez-vous que le nain soit sur le toit de la tour une fois le travail terminé
description.italian: Nel tempio, assicurati che lo gnomo sia sul tetto della torre una volta completato il lavoro
description.koreana: 사원에서 정원 요정을 탑 지붕 위에 올려놓은 상태로 작업 완료
description.spanish: En el templo, asegúrate de que el gnomo está en el tejado de la torre al acabar el trabajo.
description.schinese: 在寺庙中，完成工作时让地精留在塔顶
description.tchinese: 在寺廟確保工作完成時地精在塔頂
description.russian: Убедитесь, что гном в храме находится на крыше башни, когда вы закончите работу

description.brazilian: No Templo, certifique-se de que o gnomo esteja no telhado da torre quando o trabalho for concluído.

description.english: In the Washroom, complete the toilets last
description.german: Schließe in der Toilettenanlage die Toiletten zuletzt ab
description.french: Dans les toilettes, terminez les toilettes en dernier
description.italian: Nel bagno pubblico, completa i water per ultimi
description.koreana: 화장실에서 변기를 맨 마지막으로 세척
description.spanish: En el baño, limpia los váteres en último lugar.
description.schinese: 在卫生间，最后清洗完马桶
description.tchinese: 在洗手間最後完成馬桶
description.russian: Отмойте унитазы в туалете в последнюю очередь
description.japanese: トイレで、最後に便器を完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: Tuvalette klozetleri en son temizle
description.brazilian: No Banheiro, limpe os vasos sanitários por último.

displayName.french: La lumière à tous les étages

description.english: On the Helter Skelter, complete the objects that have lightbulbs before anything else
description.german: Schließe auf der Spiralrutsche die Objekte mit Glühbirnen vor allem anderen ab
description.french: Sur le toboggan, terminez les objets ayant des ampoules avant tout le reste
description.italian: Nello scivolo a spirale, completa per primi gli oggetti con lampadine

description.spanish: En el tobogán en espiral, limpia primero los objetos que tienen bombillas.
description.schinese: 在螺旋滑梯，先清洗完带有灯泡的物体
description.tchinese: 在螺旋狀滑梯先完成帶有燈泡的物件
description.russian: Отмойте все предметы с лампочками на спиральной горке в первую очередь
description.japanese: ヘルタースケルターで、他の何よりも先に電球を含むオブジェクトを完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: Kaydırakta öncelikle ampulü olan nesneleri tamamla
description.brazilian: No tobogã, limpe os objetos que contêm lâmpadas antes de qualquer outra coisa.

description.english: Complete the Private Jet laser and anti-gravity parts first
description.german: Schließe beim Privatjet die Laser- und Anti-Schwerkraft-Teile zuerst ab
description.french: Terminez le laser et les pièces anti-gravité du jet privé en premier
description.italian: Nel jet privato, completa per primi il laser e i componenti antigravitazionali
description.koreana: 개인용 제트기 레이저와 반중력 부품을 제일 먼저 세척
description.spanish: Limpia primero el láser y las partes antigravitatorias del avión privado.
description.schinese: 首先清洗完私人飞机激光器和反重力部件
description.tchinese: 先完成私人飛機雷射和反重力部件
description.russian: Отмойте лазеры и антигравитационные устройства частного самолета в первую очередь
description.japanese: プライベートジェットで、最初にレーザーと反重力関係の部品を完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: İlk olarak Özel Jet lazerini ve yer çekimine dayanıklı parçaları tamamla
description.brazilian: Limpe primeiro o laser e as partes antigravidade do Jato Particular.

description.english: Complete the Monster Truck tyres first
description.german: Schließe beim Monstertruck die Reifen zuerst ab
description.french: Terminez les pneus du monster truck en premier
description.italian: Nel monster truck, completa per primi gli pneumatici
description.koreana: 몬스터 트럭 타이어를 제일 먼저 세척
description.spanish: Limpia primero los neumáticos del camión monstruo.
description.schinese: 首先清洗完大脚车的轮胎
description.tchinese: 先完成大腳車輪胎
description.russian: Отмойте колеса монстр-трака в первую очередь
description.japanese: モンスタートラックで、最初にタイヤを完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: İlk olarak Canavar Kamyonet lastiklerini tamamla
description.brazilian: Limpe primeiro os pneus do Monster Truck.

description.english: Ride around the Big Wheel with a gnome
description.german: Fahre mit einem Zwerg auf dem Riesenrad
description.french: Faites un tour de grande roue avec un nain
description.italian: Fai un giro sulla ruota panoramica con uno gnomo
description.koreana: 정원 요정과 함께 대관람차 타기
description.spanish: Súbete a la noria con un gnomo.
description.schinese: 和地精乘一次摩天轮
description.tchinese: 和地精一起搭摩天輪
description.russian: Прокатитесь на колесе обозрения вместе с гномом
description.japanese: ノームを持って観覧車に乗る
description.turkish: Cüceyle birlikte Dönme Dolabın etrafında dolaş
description.brazilian: Passeie com um gnomo na Roda-gigante

description.english: In the Subway Platform, complete the advertising boards first
description.german: Schließe auf dem U-Bahn-Bahnsteig zuerst die Werbetafeln ab
description.french: Sur le quai du métro, terminez les panneaux publicitaires en premier
description.italian: Nella stazione della metro, completa per primi gli espositori pubblicitari
description.koreana: 지하철 승강장에서 광고판을 제일 먼저 세척
description.spanish: En el andén del metro, limpia primero los tablones de publicidad.
description.schinese: 在地铁站台，首先清洗完广告牌
description.tchinese: 在地鐵月台先完成廣告牌
description.russian: Отмойте рекламные щиты на платформе метро в первую очередь
description.japanese: 地下鉄のホームで、最初に広告板を完全に洗浄する
description.turkish: Metro Platformunda ilk olarak reklam panolarını tamamla
description.brazilian: Na Plataforma de Metrô, limpe primeiro os painéis de publicidade.

displayName.japanese: 死ぬまでに蹴りたいバケツ集

description.english: At the Ancient Statue, knock over four buckets
description.german: Wirf bei der Antiken Statue vier Eimer um
description.french: À la statue antique, renversez quatre seaux
description.italian: Nell'antica statua, rovescia quattro secchi
description.koreana: 고대 조각상 작업에서 양동이 4개 쓰러뜨리기
description.spanish: En la estatua antigua, derriba cuatro cubos.
description.schinese: 在古代雕塑，打翻四个桶
description.tchinese: 在古代雕像打翻四個水桶
description.russian: Опрокиньте четыре ведра возле древней статуи
description.japanese: 太古の像で、バケツを4個ひっくり返す
description.turkish: Kadim Heykelde dört kova devir
description.brazilian: Na Estátua Ancestral, derrube quatro baldes.

description.english: Completely clean the Ancient Monument using only the white nozzle
description.german: Reinige das Antike Monument vollständig, indem du nur die weiße Düse verwendest
description.french: Nettoyez entièrement le monument antique en utilisant uniquement l'embout blanc
description.italian: Pulisci completamente l'antico monumento usando solo l'ugello bianco
description.koreana: 흰색 노즐만 사용하여 고대 조형물을 완전히 청소
description.spanish: Limpia el monumento antiguo usando únicamente la boquilla blanca.
description.schinese: 仅使用白色喷嘴彻底清洗古代纪念碑
description.tchinese: 僅使用白色噴嘴徹底清潔古代紀念碑
description.russian: Полностью отмойте древний памятник, используя только белое сопло

description.turkish: Kadim Anıtı yalnızca beyaz başlığı kullanarak tamamen temizle
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente o Monumento Ancestral usando apenas o bocal branco.

displayName.french: Tout le monde sur le pont

description.english: Complete the Fishing Boat bow, steps and main deck first

description.tchinese: 請先完成漁船船首、踏階和主甲板
description.russian: Сперва завершите нос, лестницу и главную палубу рыбацкой лодки.
